name: Explosives Clicker
description:
You have been banished by the world to the forsaken land of Antarctica. Luckily, an old friend wants to help you. He will give you all kinds of weapons and explosives... for a price.

Controls: Click the dollar sign at the top of your screen to earn money or you can just go afk for 1 dollar per second. Use A and D to move and press Tab to open the Explosives Menu. Press E to open your various targets.

Note: This game is still very much in development. The future of this game is unknow and will probably change a ton as time passes by. Oh also I made this game all by me self with no tutorials or help from Me butmeme! (With one exception of Me butmeme telling me how to make text not move when you move)
